entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
